scripts.pre-release: lerna version --conventional-commits --changelog-preset conventionalcommits --no-changelog --conventional-prerelease --no-git-tag-version --preid=beta --yes -m "ci(version): version packages as pre-release"
scripts.release: lerna version --conventional-commits --changelog-preset conventionalcommits --force-git-tag --conventional-graduate --yes --create-release github -m "ci(version): version packages as release"
